about_the_game:
Feats of Legend: Limit Break - 21 Feats of Fantastic Martial Finality


Feats of Legend returns with Limit Break: 21 Feats of Fantastic Martial Finality by Clinton Boomer. Within these pages are fantastic martial feats that will allow your martial characters to break the bonds of normal combat rules and explode into awesome, heroic actions.

Warning: This PDF is an homage to a particular game where such things occur and should be used with caution. This content is not intended to be perfectly balanced, but it is intended to be a lot of fun.

21 Feats of Fantastic Martial Finality:

  • Aegis of the Avalanche
  • Blazing Astral Steps
  • Blinding Flare of Truest Fighting-Spirit
  • Brutal Limit-Charging
  • Desperate Combat Overdrive
  • Flame of the Dragon
  • Furious Limit-Charging
  • Fracture the Blistering Flow
  • Harmonious Spirit Charge
  • Limit-Charging Bolts
  • Nova of Burning Hate
  • Occult Limit-Charging
  • Pale Cloak of the True Dragon
  • Rage Beyond Death
  • Severing Strike
  • Soul-Sharpening Battle Cry
  • Swallow Your Terror
  • Trickster's Laughing Jaunt
  • Trickster's Leaping Jest
  • Unflinching Iron Juggernaut
  • Wrath from the Edge of Death

That's 21 awesome feats for only $2.99!

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Rob Twohy

Released on October 22, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included PFRPG ruleset.
